DataElement.preferredName: Medical Image Segment Service-Object Pair Class Unique Identifier java.lang.String
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Any record of a medical imaging event whether physical or electronic.:One of the parts into which something naturally divides._The information object and the service class are the two fundamental components of DICOM. Information objects define the core contents of medical imaging, and service classes define what to do with those contents. The service classes and information objects are combined to form the functional units of DICOM. This combination is called a service-object pair.:A grouping of things based on shared common attributes.:A set of characters used as a code that is unique in the context or the system for which it is created. It serves as a means of identification and reference (often instead of a name) for an entity, person, thing, function, procedure, activity, variable, or body of data._Generic value domain for a java datatype that is a class that represents character strings.

Concepts.definition: The information object and the service class are the two fundamental components of DICOM. Information objects define the core contents of medical imaging, and service classes define what to do with those contents. The service classes and information objects are combined to form the functional units of DICOM. This combination is called a service-object pair.
A grouping of things based on shared common attributes.

A set of characters used as a code that is unique in the context or the system for which it is created. It serves as a means of identification and reference (often instead of a name) for an entity, person, thing, function, procedure, activity, variable, or body of data.
